alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 6:42PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ferry and east central Okanogan Counties through 715 PM PDT... At 642 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Sherman Pass, or 39 miles east of Omak, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Ferry and east central Okanogan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
